headline: Forget 'TACO' And Buy SCHD
summary: SCHD, with a 4% yield, strong dividend growth, and low volatility, is a top pick for income investors seeking long-term, low-stress wealth. Read more on why SCHD is a Strong Buy.

headline: Buy Altria Stock? There Are 1.69 Billion Reasons to Worry.
summary: Altria has been facing volume declines in its core cigarette business for years.  The company has been able to offset a lot of the decline with price increases.  Higher prices aren't enough to keep Altria's earnings growing, so management is also leaning on this potentially worrying tool.

raw.headline: Buy Altria Stock? There Are 1.69 Billion Reasons to Worry.
